text:
The White Lions are the military police force of [[Karrnath]] charged with handling internal security of the nation. Problems too large for local police to handle are elevated to the White Lions, who sweep in with brutal efficiency to restore order and compliance with the [[Code of Kaius]]. Their headquarters is located in the nation's capital, [[Korth]], where the Lions also serve as that city's garrison under the command of General [[Yorin Thauram]].

The  [[Twilight Brigade]], colloquially known as the "Dark Lions," are a division of the White Lions that serve as counterintelligence agents and secret police.
title: White Lions
